attributes.action: ensure that Robert Mugabe is stripped of the title Knight Commander of the Order of the Bath
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In view of Robert Mugabe's appalling human rights record we ask the Prime Minister to ensure that Mugabe is stripped of the title Knight Commander of the Order of the Bath bestowed on him by Queen Elizabeth II in 1994.

Mugabe's political party is implicated in state sponsored murder, torture, violence and intimidation.
His legacy in Zimbabwe is a nation in crisis with the highest inflation rate of any nation, a life expectancy of 34, and 80% of the population living below the poverty line. Mugabe views Britain as a enemy of the sovereignty of Zimbabwe.

This is not a man worthy of the title KCB. This title is adding legitimacy and validating his despotic regime.

Strip Mugabe of this honour!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
